simplified: 一颗老鼠屎坏了一锅汤

pronunciation.pinyin: yī kē lǎo shǔ shǐ huài le yī guō tāng
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: yi1 ke1 lao3 shu3 shi3 huai4 le5 yi1 guo1 tang1

details.simplified: 一颗老鼠屎坏了一锅汤
details.traditional: 一顆老鼠屎壞了一鍋湯

meanings.value: a piece of rat feces spoiled the whole pot of soup
fig. one bad apple can spoil the whole bunch
